dcterms:description: The dataset is comprised of a set of 10,000 memes each with their image, text, and label (either hateful or not) split into development, test, and training sets. Labels were annotated based on a specific definition of hate, and the dataset includes multimodal hate, unimodal hate, benign text confounders, benign image confounders, and random non-hateful memes.
dcterms:title: Hateful Memes Challenge
